ops_per_clock_notes.int8: 537 INT8 tiles x 512 ops + 77 Matrix tiles x 8192 ops = 274,944 + 630,784 = 905,728 INT8 ops/clock
ops_per_clock_notes.bf16: 154 BF16 tiles x 256 ops + 77 Matrix tiles x 4096 ops = 39,424 + 315,392 = 354,816 BF16 ops/clock
ops_per_clock_notes.int4: 537 INT8 tiles x 1024 ops + 77 Matrix tiles x 8192 ops = 549,888 + 630,784 = 1,180,672 INT4 ops/clock
ops_per_clock_notes.note: 768 heterogeneous tiles (537 INT8, 154 BF16, 77 Matrix). 32x24 grid. 12nm/7nm TSMC.

theoretical_peaks_notes: Peaks @ 1.2 GHz (60W mode). INT8: 905,728 ops/clock x 1.2 GHz = 1,086.9 TOPS. BF16: 354,816 ops/clock x 1.2 GHz = 425.8 TFLOPS.
notes: Datacenter KPU for AI inference. 768 heterogeneous tiles (70/20/10 INT8/BF16/Matrix). 7nm TSMC. 192MB distributed L3. HBM3 1.6 TB/s. For LLM inference, batch processing. 75-85% efficiency factor.
